column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////If I was rating the food on looks
column2: it would get a 5 star rating.  The service was nice
column4: we ate the restaurant weeks dinner and it ranged from ok to weird.  The cold vichyssoise was like bitter foam with a strong sour cream taste.  The pork belly was mostly fat
column5: almost zero meat.  The crab cakes were ok
column6: but they lay on a bed of really hard vegetables.  And the turtle brownies were really hard and just OK.  And on a side note
column7: their restrooms are out in the foyer so you have to go backwards through the narrow order line to go back out to get to them which is very awkward.  For their prices I don't think I would gamble and go back for anything else.
